name: Klaktil Integrant
description: You are a member of a Klaktil Hive and have been absorbed into their unified mind. While the king or queen of the hive is alive and on the same celestial body as you, you are considered permanently charmed by the hive and are immune to charm effects from other sources. You no longer have the ability to concentrate, but become immune to the maddened and confused conditions.

options.name: Hivemind
options.description: You are part of a hivemind that is ruled by a central king or queen. If they are alive and on the same celestial body as you, you are considered permanently charmed by the hive and are immune to charm effects from other sources, as well as immune to the maddened and confused conditions.

options.name: Knowledge of the Hive
options.description: You have access to a trove of information that your hive possesses as a unified mind. All of your knowledge skills are upgraded.
